title: VMware Solutions docs
introduction: VMware Solutions is a group of IBM Cloud offerings that provide deployment and management of VMware virtualized environments. Learn how to make the most of your VMware Solutions experience by using the user documentation, REST API documentation reference, solution architectures, and solution guides.

section_recommended.title: Getting started with VMware Solutions
section_recommended.description: Get familiar with the process of ordering an instance and some services for it.

section_recommended.title: Signing up for required accounts
section_recommended.description: Sign up for an IBM Cloud account and an IBM Cloud infrastructure account.

section_recommended.title: Accessing the VMware Solutions console
section_recommended.description: Review the entry points into the IBM Cloud for VMware Solutions console.

section_recommended.title: Setting up your environment for your first order
section_recommended.description: Ensure that your environment is ready for your order.

tiles.title: Veeam 12.1.1 for VMware Shared
tiles.description: Veeam Backup and Replication 12.1.1 (Veeam 12.1.1) is now available for deployment with the VMware Shared offering.

tiles.title: Updated packaging and pricing for VMware Solutions offerings
tiles.description: IBM Cloud is changing its IBM Cloud for VMware Solutions portfolio and pricing, in response to the changes to the packaging and pricing of the VMware portfolio, announced by Broadcom. These changes will be effective on 1 May 2024.

tiles.title: End of Support for VMware Shared deployments
tiles.description: Starting on 28 March 2024, VMware Shared will no longer be available for new deployments. Existing instances will continue to be supported until 15 January 2025. Ensure that you migrate all your VMware Shared resources to IBM Cloud for VMware as a Service by 15 January 2025.
